entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 09:32 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow

Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 85 %

Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
